formElement.label: Configuration name
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port, and credentials are retrieved from the specified plugin configuration.

formElement.label: WLST script absolute path
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST (for example, /path/to/wlst.cmd or wlst.sh). If this path is specified, you do not need to apply the equal parameter in procedures. Note that you must install the agent to the machine that has access to the WLST script.

formElement.label: Maximum elapsed time
formElement.documentation: Defines the maximum time, in seconds, that the job tries to check on the cluster. If left blank, there is no wait time and the URL is only checked once.

formElement.label: Success criteria
formElement.documentation: Expected result when running the check on the cluster.

formElement.label: Cluster name
formElement.documentation: Name of the cluster to be checked.
